Description: "Key for the check. Maximum size: 1) For groth16Verify_<N>inputs function — :math:`384 + 48 × N` bytes. 2) For groth16Verify function — :math:`384 + 48 × 16 = 1152` bytes."
"Zero-knowledge proof's public inputs array. For example
column3: array of UTXO hashes in case of shielded transactions. Maximum size: 1) For groth16Verify_<N>inputs function – :math:`32 × N` bytes. 2) For groth16Verify function – :math:`512` bytes."
